publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4747 Jackie Baillie: 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s—That the Parliament congratulates Our Lady and St Mark’s on the 150th Anniversary of the founding of the parish in Alexandria; notes that the parish is a vital part of the community in Alexandria; welcomes the Mass of Thanksgiving held on 5 August 2009 to celebrate this milestone, and wishes the parish and the church another successful 150 years at the heart of the community in Alexandria.
S3M-4747 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s (lodged on 31 August 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Bob Doris*, Des McNulty*, James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4747 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s (lodged on 31 August 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Whitefield*, Bill Butler*, Pauline McNeill*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-4747 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s (lodged on 31 August 2009) Helen Eadie*

S3M-4747 Jackie Baillie: 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s—That the Parliament congratulates Our Lady and St Mark’s on the 150th Anniversary of the founding of the parish in Alexandria; notes that the parish is a vital part of the community in Alexandria; welcomes the Mass of Thanksgiving held on 5 August 2009 to celebrate this milestone, and wishes the parish and the church another successful 150 years at the heart of the community in Alexandria. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Gil Paterson, Bob Doris, Des McNulty, James Kelly, Marilyn Livingstone, Mary Mulligan, Bill Kidd, Karen Whitefield, Bill Butler, Pauline McNeill, Ross Finnie, Helen Eadie, Sandra White*
S3M-4747 150th Anniversary of Our Lady and St Mark’s (lodged on 31 August 2009) Sarah Boyack*
